scripts.build: parcel build src/service_worker.js src/content.js src/popup.js src/popup.html src/default_blur.css --dist-dir dist/src && mkdir -p dist && cp -a public/. dist/
scripts.watch: parcel watch src/service_worker.js src/content.js src/popup.js src/popup.html src/default_blur.css --dist-dir dist/src
scripts.clean: rm -rf .parcel-cache dist node_modules package-lock.json && echo 'Workspace wiped â€” run npm install or docker build next.'
